title: Campaign Press Aides Move From the Shadows to Social Media Stardom
description: Merely speaking for a candidate and dealing with reporters are not enough for a new breed of influencers, as some pugilistic campaign aides have tens or even hundreds of thousands of followers.
dc:creator: Michael C. Bender
media:credit: Bridget Bennett for The New York Times
media:description: Courtney Holland, the communications director for Adam Laxaltâ€™s Senate campaign in Nevada, at a protest in Las Vegas concerning the results of the 2020 election.
